github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text:
This workspace is in a dev container running on "Debian GNU/Linux 12 (bookworm)".

Use `"$BROWSER" <url>` to open a webpage in the host's default browser.

Some of the command line tools available on the `PATH`: `apt`, `dpkg`, `git`, `curl`, `wget`, `find`, `grep`, `tar`, `gzip`
